args.natural_language_statement: Let z in C with |z| < 1. Show that |log(1-z)| ≤ sum_{n=1}^∞ |z|^n / n ≤ |z|/(1-|z|). Provide Lean4 statement (no proof), ending with := by sorry.

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open intervalIntegral in
open intervalIntegral in
open Filter Asymptotics in

/-- Let z in C with |z| < 1. Show that |log(1-z)| ≤ sum_{n=1}^∞ |z|^n / n ≤ |z|/(1-|z|). Provide Lean4 statement (no proof), ending with := by sorry. -/
theorem abs_log_sub_le_tsum_of_abs_lt_one {z : ℂ} (hz : |z| < 1) :
    abs (Complex.log (1 - z)) ≤ ∑' n : ℕ, |z| ^ n / (n + 1) ∧
    ∑' n : ℕ, |z| ^ n / (n + 1) ≤ |z| / (1 - |z|) := sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Let z in C with |z| < 1. Then |log(1 - z)| ≤ ∑_{n=1}^∞ |z|^n / n ≤ |z|/(1-|z|). -/
theorem abs_log_sub_le_tsum_of_abs_lt_one {z : ℂ} (hz : Complex.abs z < 1) :
  Complex.abs (Complex.log (1 - z)) ≤ ∑' (n : ℕ), Complex.abs z ^ (n + 1) / (n + 1 : ℝ) ∧
  ∑' (n : ℕ), Complex.abs z ^ (n + 1) / (n + 1 : ℝ) ≤ Complex.abs z / (1 - Complex.abs z) := by sorry
